about_the_game:
.

.

■PLicy Game Contest Runner-up Prize Winner ■[/b

The complete version of the well-received free game “Akairo Mansion - Horror Edition” is now available with additional episodes!
A dramatic horror novel presented to sound novel lovers by the author who is a sound novel lover.
Escape from an apartment building that has become a closed circle due to a mysterious phenomenon. The outcome is left to your choice.


■Create your own unique game experience, multiple choices and endings.

This title features multiple endings, with a total of 55 endings. It is up to you to choose which option you want to take and which ending you want to reach.
The story changes depending on the order in which the players play the game. The so-called “bad endings” are also foreshadowed in some cases.
This is a story created jointly by the game and the player.


■Feelings of the free version.

I couldn't stop clicking the mouse...I was so curious about what was going to happen that I read it in one sitting...[/b]I liked the three-dimensional structure of the story, which you can't really tell from one route.


■The free trial version also has additional elements from the free version.

The free trial version includes the entire “horror version” with further additional elements.
New developments and choices await players, even if they have already cleared the free version “Akairo Mansion - Horror Arc”.

Contents.

■Part 1 “Horror Edition”.

An apartment building where one moves in for a new life. The mysterious deaths of the residents there.
You are the main character Ryo (name can be changed), a university student, and together with the heroine Haruna (name can be changed), you must unravel the mystery of the apartment.

Estimated playing time for the horror story: about 8 hours.
You can play the horror version until the end in the free demo version. The demo version can be played live.
Data transfer from the demo version to the full version is possible. Please refer to the readme of the trial version for how to do so.


Story.
This spring, college student “I” move to a new house to live alone for the first time.
However, there is a strange rule in his new home, the “Akaishi Mansion”.
The rule is that the residents vote to decide everything in the condominium's autonomy.

While being welcomed by the eccentric residents, an incident occurs.
A resident suddenly dies a strange death. And suddenly, “Hanaichimonme” rings from a cell phone.
The apartment is closed by a mysterious force and the residents are trapped.

I” learns that this apartment is the place where a serial murderer lived 15 years ago.
The case was that seven people died after their heads were chopped off. ......

This strange coincidence leads the residents to believe in the existence of a curse.
And the referendum continues even after the death of a person. Even life and death are left up to the vote.

Will the residents be saved? Will they be able to solve the mystery of the curse?
The choice is left to you.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains content that is not suitable for all ages or may not be suitable for viewing in the workplace, including: violent or gore content, self-harm, suicide, and general adult content.
